title.native: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない
title.romaji: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai
title.english: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms

description:
Gorgeous from head to toe! The perfect figure! To Kawai Mona, winning hearts comes as naturally as breathing... but the arrival of Kuroiwa Medaka, a new transfer student who won't even give her a second look, turns her school life upside-down! She's lived her whole life being fawned over, so why is he any different? Mona tries everything she can think of to win Medaka over, even getting a bit extreme at times! This new rom-com starring a queen bee and a celibate boy is about to burst onto the scene!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
hashtag: #黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない #メダかわ
synonyms: Мэдака Куроива не понимает моей привлекательности

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

node.description:
They are a former assistant of the mangaka [Mizuki Kawashita](https://anilist.co/staff/96905/Mizuki-Kawashita).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ranomannma) | [Pixiv Fanbox](https://kuzeoekaki.fanbox.cc/)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/231414719)

Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/)'s photography department.

[Website](https://highkick.jp/tateyama)

He is a drummer for the Japanese rock band THE LINDA!, which was formed in 2002 when its members were enrolled at Rikkyo University.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/231414719)

Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/)'s photography department.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/watawayuwaasa)

Originating from [Kaname Production](https://anilist.co/studio/288/).

Married to producer [Saburou Oomiya](https://anilist.co/staff/114329/).
__Aiko Yamagami__ is a Japanese color designer and digital painter.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/linksoundd)

**Height:** 155 cm
**Fanbase name:** Sukon-bu
**Illustrator:** [Mito Nagashiro](https://anilist.co/staff/134537/)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/shirakami-fubuki/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdn5BQ06XqgXoAxIhbqw5Rg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shirakamifubuki) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/332704117/)

*"Foxy day to you! I'm Shirakami Fubuki!"*

A white haired kemomimi (animal-eared) highschool student. Although she is shy and mostly calm, she likes to talk to people. She would be very happy if you pay attention to her.

Shirakami Fubuki is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Part of the first generation wave of Hololive and is also a part of hololive GAMERS.

**Height:** 165 cm
**Fanbase name:** Mio-fa
**Illustrator:** [Sai Izumi](https://anilist.co/staff/125532)

 [Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/ookami-mio/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp-5t9SrOQwXMU7iIjQfARg)  | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ookamimio) |  [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/389862071/)

*"Hellooowl! It is Ookami Mio!"*

A black haired kemomimi girl who appeared on our radar randomly. She often shows up around shrines. She likes gaming.

**Height:** 152 cm
**Fanbase name:** Nakiri-gumi
**Illustrator:** [Kagura Nana](https://anilist.co/staff/143642/)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/nakiri-ayame/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7fk0CB07ly8oSl0aqKkqFg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nakiriayame) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/389858027/)

*"Greetings, humans! Nakiri Ayame has arrived!"*

A kimono-clad Oni girl from the Demonic-Realm Academy. As she loves to prank people, she always uses will-o’-the-wisp on them just to have fun. Many may not realize it, but she is actually the president of the student council.

__Height:__ 147cm
__Agency:__ Amuse

[Profile (Amuse)](https://www.amuse.co.jp/artist/A8884/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaor1n_n) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/maedakaori_official) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpErCU3g3P5cN3lMNfcwYEw)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Poli - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Lingsha - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
